briefdescription.para: Interrupt Timer library This library provides basic functions for performing timer operations.

detaileddescription.para: When interrupts are enabled, the ISR can contain a callback function to allow the user to perform critical actions at the exact time the timer has reached its count. To use this facility, create a file timercallback.h in the same directory, with the function prototypes: void timer0CallBack() void timer1CallBack() void timer2CallBack() defined, according to the number of timers in the MCU. This can then be filled out as desired. The callback feature can be disabled.
